DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effect Dapagliflozin Incidence Worsening Heart Failure Cardiovascular Death Patients With Chronic Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: This international , multicentre , parallel group , event-driven , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study patient chronic heart failure reduce ejection fraction ( HFrEF ) , evaluate effect dapagliflozin versus placebo , give daily addition background regional standard care therapy , prevention cardiovascular ( CV ) death reduction heart failure ( HF ) event .
